data.comment: Today's referee, Maurizio Mariani, has blown to start the match.
Gianluca Scamacca for Genoa drives towards goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in the half of Genoa.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Parma Calcio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
In the minute 10, Can Parma Calcio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Parma Calcio take a 0-1 lead thanks to Gervinho.
Juraj Kucka with an assist there.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Genoa in the half of Parma Calcio.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Genoa's Gianluca Scamacca is whistled for offside at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 16, Maurizio Mariani awards the away team a throw-in.
Genoa's Eldor Shomurodov gets in a shot on goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Parma Calcio are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 17, Attention is being given to Parma Calcio’s Yordan Osorio and play has been suspended briefly.
Parma Calcio's Yordan Osorio is back in action after a slight knock.
The match at Luigi Ferraris has been interrupted briefly for a check on Riccardo Gagliolo, who is down injured.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 20, Riccardo Gagliolo (Parma Calcio) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Vincent Laurini.
Free kick Genoa.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Genoa close to the penalty box.
Maurizio Mariani awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
Throw-in Genoa.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Genoa's Stefano Sturaro has run offside.
Maurizio Mariani signals a Genoa throw-in in Parma Calcio's half.
In the minute 26, Genoa to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
Can Genoa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
Genoa are pushing forward but Milan Badelj's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 27, Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gianluca Scamacca for Genoa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Luigi Ferraris.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in the half of Genoa.
In the minute 34, Parma Calcio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Luigi Ferraris.
Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
In the minute 37, Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Throw-in Parma Calcio.
In the minute 41, Parma Calcio's Gervinho misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
Maurizio Mariani signals a throw-in for Parma Calcio, close to Genoa's area.
In the minute 42, Maurizio Mariani awards the home team a throw-in.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Edoardo Goldaniga of Genoa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 43, Maurizio Mariani awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
Parma Calcio are coming forward and Gervinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 45, Gervinho (Parma Calcio) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
Genoa are whistled for offside.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Genoa.
In the minute 45, Genoa's Luca Pellegrini gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, Maurizio Mariani has blown to start the second-half.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Goal! Gervinho extends Parma Calcio's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 50, Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 1-2 through a strike by Eldor Shomurodov. .
Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Maurizio Mariani signals a Parma Calcio throw-in in Genoa's half.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Genoa have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Corner awarded to Genoa.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Parma Calcio at Luigi Ferraris.
Gervinho for Parma Calcio is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 57, Genoa are pushing forward but Stefano Sturaro's finish is wide of the goal.
Maurizio Mariani awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Can Genoa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
In the minute 58, At Luigi Ferraris, Maxime Busi has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Matteo Scozzarella is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 60, Matteo Scozzarella is back on his feet again.
Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in the half of Genoa.
In the minute 62, Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Genoa.
Matteo Scozzarella, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Hernani is the substitute for Parma Calcio.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
In the minute 64, Genoa to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Luigi Ferraris.
Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 65, Maurizio Mariani blows against Parma Calcio's Andreas Cornelius for offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Genoa's Milan Badelj is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 67, Yann Karamoh (Parma Calcio) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Maurizio Mariani signals a Genoa throw-in in Parma Calcio's half.
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rolando Maran (Genoa) is making a first substitution, with Miha Zajc replacing Eldor Shomurodov.
Goran Pandev is replacing Lukas Lerager for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Parma Calcio's Yann Karamoh misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 73, Maurizio Mariani awards Genoa a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Paolo Ghiglione gets his shot on target but fails to score for Genoa.
Simone Iacoponi is replacing Maxime Busi for the away team.
Parma Calcio make their fourth substitution with Alberto Grassi replacing Yann Karamoh.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Genoa.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Parma Calcio in the half of Genoa.
Stefano Sturaro (Genoa) has received a first yellow card.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, In Genoa Parma Calcio's Gervinho is caught offside.
Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
Andreas Cornelius for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Parma Calcio in the half of Genoa.
The home team have replaced Paolo Ghiglione with Vittorio Parigini. This is the third substitution made today by Rolando Maran.
Rolando Maran is making the team's fourth substitution at Luigi Ferraris with Marko Pjaca replacing Milan Badelj.
In the minute 83, Genoa's Gianluca Scamacca is whistled for offside at Luigi Ferraris.
Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 84, Mattia Bani is booked for the home team.
Maurizio Mariani waits before resuming play because Andreas Cornelius for Parma Calcio is still down.
Parma Calcio's Andreas Cornelius looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 86, Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Maurizio Mariani awards the away team a throw-in.
In Genoa Parma Calcio's Andreas Cornelius is caught offside.
In the minute 87, Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Luigi Ferraris.
In Genoa Parma Calcio attack through Gervinho. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
Goran Pandev of Genoa gets in a strike, but is off target.
Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, The home team replace Mattia Bani with Mattia Destro.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Parma Calcio.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Parma Calcio just outside Genoa's area.
Free kick Parma Calcio.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Genoa's Luca Pellegrini breaks free at Luigi Ferraris. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-2.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Genoa to check on Alberto Grassi, who is grimacing with pain.
